thread.title: Anushka Sharma Mixes Sporty With A Little Bit Of Chic
thread.title_full: Anushka Sharma Mixes Sporty With A Little Bit Of Chic

author: Natasha Patel
title: Anushka Sharma Mixes Sporty With A Little Bit Of Chic

organizations.name: anushka sharma mixes sporty with a little bit of chic natasha patel mar

text:
Natasha Patel Mar . 15 . 2017 Anushka Sharma 
After Anushka Sharma ‘s disco diva look from yesterday, she channeled her inner Posh Spice mixed with Sporty Spice… Wearing a long body-fitted jersey dress with yellow and white detailing, Anushka looked too hot! To elevate her look further, stylist Allia Al Rufai paired the dress with black tie-up heels and a slicked-back ponytail. 
If this isn’t the perfect sporty-chic look you’ve seen, then I don’t know what will be! 
Excuse us while we go perfect this look now. Bye! 12
